Subject: New Use Case for PII Detection
Description:
Hello,

We have a new use case where we need to block PII + Donor information from being emailed within the Outlook platform. How can we build this combination without it triggering just regular PII information for certain users?
Solution_Comment__c:
We created a policy and made a combination of 1 regex + 3-4 PII items. We set the Global Threshold to 5 so if 5 or more violations(items) occur then the policy will trigger a block. If 4 or less occur it will not be blocked.

We currently only set it up for attached upload files as per macOS we would need DPI + DPI certificate to be added in order to test this.
